title: A Thief on Morgan's Plantation
description: An exciting series of Historical Fiction starring great events in America's past and spunky young protagonists who help solve mysteries in their times. Silver Moon Press has discovered that the way to the hearts and minds of young readers is through their love of mystery and suspense. Each book is reviewed for accuracy by a historical expert.As the Civil War begins, young Constance Morgan is sent south from Philadelphia to live with relatives she has never met. Soon after she arrives, she finds herself embroiled in a conflict in which a young slave is accused of stealing a family heirloom. With tensions running high in her family, in the state of Maryland, and in the country as a whole, will Constance hold her calm long enough to find the real thief?
author: Lisa Banim
